name: The WolfPack Freshman
description: Have you wondered what it is like to be a freshman in college? If you have already been one, then have you wondered how it could have gone differently? The WolfPack Freshman is a text-based interactive narrative that lets you dictate how your freshman year will go. It's been told that the first 5 days of your college experience usually shape who you will become, so you better make the most of it!
